name: Stella Dei
description:
WARNING: This demo is an highly experimental prototype of the game. It's far from done, as more and more features are coming.

Stella Dei is a sandbox game for those who are thrilled about the idea of controlling your very own little planet. By controlling all physical aspects, you can have an Earth-like planet or make it rotate so slowly that there's one hot side and one cold side.
And now, add life to the equation. Even more, the game is open-source and free.

Create

Each time you play, you have an unique planet, bare, with no life and instable conditions. And this planet's fate will forever be affected by your actions.

Make life

In livable planets, you can send a meteor in order to beta-test life on your planet. If it lives, great, if it dies in horrible suffering, maybe adjust the climate a bit.

Destroy

As you hold the power of changing the world in your hands, you may experiment what a few more CO2 might do, or if a 2°C rise won't kill most living beings. The world and its delicate harmony is yours.

Community

There's also a small discord community where I show pictures of new features and new bugs :'( and it's also where you can directly suggest me ideas or tell me valuable feedback.
